Dragonborn Tips & Notes

In other sources, the Dragonborn race features +2 Strength and +1 Charisma. This will be changed on the full launch of BG3 and the Ability Score points are now associated with the Class that players will choose. Most dragonborn have a conal breath, the only exception is Brass subrace which ha
